## Description {#details}

Build a wrapper struct that has 8-byte alignment.

All heap allocations should provide this much alignment at least, but this makes it clear we specifically rely on this amount of alignment.

Definition at line 69 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/globalsmodref-cpp">GlobalsModRef.cpp</a>.
